faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before starting. We answer your most common questions about payments, commissions, training, licenses, support and technology.

q1.question: What is ProAgent?
q1.answer: ProAgent is a next-generation traveltech platform, created in the United States and designed especially for Hispanic travel agents in the USA and Latin America. It integrates professional engines, global providers and two artificial intelligences to help you build a profitable and scalable travel business.

q2.question: Can I change plans later?
q2.answer: Yes. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan whenever you need to. Changes are applied immediately.

q3.question: What does the commission split mean (70/30, 80/20, 90/10)?
q3.answer: It is the percentage of the commission that you receive as an agent and the percentage that corresponds to ProAgent only when you make reservations with providers. Example: in a 70/30 split, you receive 70% and ProAgent 30%.

q4.question: Does the plan include all search engines?
q4.answer: Yes. All plans include complete engines for: Hotels, Flights, Transfers, Activities, Circuits, Trains, Insurance and eSIM. Higher plans add additional categories such as cruises, Disney, cars, sport/events, routing, luxury and groups.

q5.question: Is Artificial Intelligence really included?
q5.answer: Yes, but with different levels depending on the plan: ProAgent Plus and Master include 1 exclusive ProAgent AI for deep queries, creating itineraries and optimizing proposals. ProAgent Elite includes the 2 artificial intelligences, combining our exclusive AI with an additional advanced AI that returns travel offers from a single prompt. Practical example: 'Create a 5-day itinerary to Punta Cana for a family with children, with a beachfront hotel, activities and transfers.' The AI delivers a complete plan ready to book or send to the client.

q6.question: What are premium providers and luxury providers?
q6.answer: Premium Providers: leading wholesalers in specialized niches and top tour operators in the USA, Caribbean, Europe and Latin America. Luxury: exclusive providers of 5* hotels, premium experiences and high-end DMCs, available in higher plans.

q7.question: What providers does ProAgent include?
q7.answer: We work with: Global providers and hotel chains, Premium tour operators from the United States, Leading wholesalers in specialized niches, Operators preferred by Latino travelers in Florida and Latin America, and Strong partners in Spain and Europe. We guarantee variety, competitive prices and real access to the big players in the market.

q8.question: Can I issue flights, hotels and packages from the same platform?
q8.answer: Yes. ProAgent integrates engines for hotels, flights, packages, circuits, cruises, transfers, activities, cars, events, trains and insurance. In addition, it includes Trip Planner, your premium tool to create custom trips from one place.

q9.question: What makes ProAgent different from other traditional host agencies?
q9.answer: Everything. ProAgent is a next-generation platform for agents, designed for the future of travel. It integrates AI, global providers, advanced tools and the strength of the Azúcar Travel umbrella brand. We sell travel. We know how to do it.

q10.question: When do I collect my commissions?
q10.answer: Commissions are paid up to 7-15 days after the provider settles with ProAgent, once the client's trip has ended.

q11.question: What support do I receive as an advisor?
q11.answer: It depends on the chosen plan: Standard (support via tickets), Priority Plus (faster response and improved support + whatsapp), VIP Master (direct access, absolute priority and specialized support + whatsapp). All plans include essential training and basic support to help you sell better, even if it's your first time.

q12.question: Do I need previous experience to use ProAgent?
q12.answer: No. ProAgent is designed for both new and experienced agents. AI and continuous training help you learn while you sell.

q13.question: Can I work from any country?
q13.answer: Yes. ProAgent works in the USA, Latin America and anywhere you can legally sell. Many agents operate 100% remotely.

q14.question: Do I need licenses to sell travel?
q14.answer: If you reside in the USA, ProAgent covers you under the Host Agency structure. If you are in Latin America, you can operate without problems with international providers. If you will sell under your own official brand, you will probably need licenses. We advise you in the process.

q15.question: Do plan prices include taxes or additional charges?
q15.answer: Yes. Prices are final, with no hidden fees.

q16.question: Is there a contract or minimum stay?
q16.answer: No. You can cancel whenever you want. There is no mandatory stay. ProAgent reserves the right of readmission.

q17.question: Does ProAgent deliver clients to me?
q17.answer: ProAgent mainly helps you generate them. However, certified agents can access verified leads with shared commission, through the global lead generation system and the Lead Accelerator. Everything that works for ProAgent —sales, campaigns, influencers, content and real hooks— is transferred to you so you can generate your own clients with proven processes.

q18.question: Can I operate with my own brand within ProAgent?
q18.answer: Yes. ProAgent allows you to operate with your own brand and commercial structure, using ProAgent's technology, providers and support as support.

q19.question: How does being part of the Azúcar Travel ProAgent brand benefit me?
q19.answer: Because you integrate into a brand that sells, travels and understands what works in the real market. You access validated campaigns, sales scripts, templates, advanced advertising strategies and a complete technological platform to plan, quote, sell and follow up on a trip without leaving the system.
